snippet.title: Pony Kart DS (MKDS Mod)
snippet.description:
started this back in April, took a 2 month break I think and then got back to it and decided to get it to a point where I can stop working on it for a long while, I got other things to do (yes I will try to get to updating the pizza tower mod when I can) 

The mod contains 12 custom characters (each with 1 custom kart), 16 custom tracks (replacing the retro tracks from Mario Kart DS) and has most items edited to fit in more with MLP

The included characters:

Twilight 
Rarity
Pinkie Pie
Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Spike
Discord

(Unlockable)
Derpy
Starlight
Trixie
DJ PON-3



you can download the mod here!
https://gamebanana.com/mods/546719
